Package io.github.zero88.schedulerx.impl

Class AbstractScheduler<IN,OUT,T extends Trigger>

java.lang.Object
io.github.zero88.schedulerx.impl.AbstractScheduler<IN,OUT,T>
Type Parameters:
IN - Type of job input data
OUT - Type of output data
T - Type of trigger
All Implemented Interfaces:
HasVertx, JobExecutor<OUT>, JobExecutorConfig<IN,OUT>, Scheduler<T>, SchedulerConfig<T,OUT>
@Internal public abstract class AbstractScheduler<IN,OUT,T extends Trigger> extends Object implements Scheduler<T>, SchedulerConfig<T,OUT>, JobExecutorConfig<IN,OUT>, JobExecutor<OUT>
The base scheduler
